title: SAP: Enable self-service user unblock from Microsoft Teams using BAPI
description: This workflow template triggers on a recurring schedule, enables SAP self-service user unblock from Teams channels, and uses SAP's standard BAPI 'BAPI_USER_UNLOCK'. For more information, see [Connect to SAP from Standard logic apps using BAPI and RFC](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2282035).
